ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and whoever wills pays heed to it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For any one who desires to bear it in mind,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So whoso wills may give heed to it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: so let those who want to follow its guidance do so.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So whoever wishes may remember it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, whoever wills, let him pay attention to Him (it).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So let him who pleases mind it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So let whosoever will pay heed to it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Let him who will, pay heed to it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So whosoever willeth-let him be admonished therewlth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Therefore let whoso will, keep it in remembrance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So whoever wills, let him pay attention to it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and whosoever wills, shall remember it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So whoever wills may remember it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [80:12] so let whoever will, remember it, preserve it [in his memory] and thus be admonished by it —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So let whosoever will pay heed to it) whoever Allah wants him to be admonished will be admonished,
